title: Does the privacy.riotgames webpage not have as much info anymore?
body:
I went onto said page and it didn't have as much info as it used to. (money spent, kills, wins, cs etc all missing from page)

[used to look like this guys](https://i.gyazo.com/a7706ef4f09210092d02760ab9651434.png)

[Mine only shows this much now](http://imgur.com/a/DB7Th)

Not too important, but was wondering what all my current stats are.

replies.body:
First of all, epic name btw. Fierce Diety Link FTW.

It does look like some of that data isn't readily available from the looks of your screenshot. You can get the rest of the info still by clicking on that "Looking for More?" button though!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=fAxfa2LW,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-08-18T04:21:48.144+0000)
>
> First of all, epic name btw. Fierce Diety Link FTW.
> 
> It does look like some of that data isn't readily available from the looks of your screenshot. You can get the rest of the info still by clicking on that "Looking for More?" button though!

The Looking for More? button includes information that requires MAILING YOU $5 for the rest of the info
And that doesn't include the stats that were missing it just seems like an error on the system and probably should be checked out as all of us have the problem too. {{summoner:6}} ZOOM! {{summoner:4}}
Last season i could see more informations about my account. Now I can just see basics information.
It showed all the extra info when i last looked, which was about a year ago. just curious to know why it disappeared.

I definitely remember it looking like that before, and now it doesn't show game stats or money spent statistics for me either. No transaction history could be found. That's pretty cheap for someone who owns every skin currently available I'd say! I don't know about you, but I'd rather not send a hand written letter along with $5 to get 3 months worth of junk and a detailed report of all transactions that comes with the "Looking for More" button. I'd rather have that one page with the general statistics :)
